description: Shopee Open Platform is a go-to source of Open APIs and services for developers serving Shopee sellers with different ecommerce needs

sections.name: What is Shopee Open Platform?
key_features: Powerful APIs for orders, products, marketing with push notification services
Comprehensive developer services including onboarding, testing, release, and maintenance
Open API testing tools and sandbox environments
Documentation, Support Center, and Announcement pages

sections.name: Benefits of using Shopee Open API
sections.description: Provides quick access to shop data for product, order, and campaign management across all markets with single API integration

sections.name: Who can access Shopee Open Platform

user_types.description: Access to comprehensive APIs for ecommerce processes
Can develop custom software and integrate systems for operations optimization

notes: This appears to be an introduction/overview page of the Shopee Open Platform documentation rather than a specific API endpoint documentation. It contains general information about the platform, its benefits, and who can access it. No specific API endpoint details are provided in this chunk.
